resources.string: Enable accessibility in the settings screen for %1$s to show movie ratings in %2$s
%1$s needs permission to draw over other apps to show movie ratings when you\'re browsing %2$s
Unable to open device settings page. Please enable the permission manually. We apologize for the inconvenience.
Unable to open accessibility settings page. Please enable the permission manually. We apologize for the inconvenience.
Search for movies and tv shows

string.name: accessibility_info_target_name
string.b: Netflix, Amazon Prime Video and other supported apps

resources.string:
Turn ON the accessibility for Flutter to get movie ratings while you're browsing. It helps Flutter to get the name of the movie from the app.

Once you turn on the button, Android will show you a dialog which will give you info about what Flutter will get access to.

Flutter also offers Text to Speech support to help people with disabilities by speaking out loud the rating of the movie.

Flutter will retrieve window content and process it to find the movie title in the supported apps and show you the rating of the movie.

If you want to turn Flutter off for a particular app, click on SETTINGS in the app on top and you can enable/disable Flutter for particular apps.
Flutter requires accessibility permission to retrieve name of the movie to show you the ratings.
Flutter also supports %1s - which are not installed on your device.
Set the duration for movie ratings to be displayed on your screen (in seconds)
Flutter allows you to save your data offline. You may also import data (collections, likes) from a file.
Delete all your data including likes, collections and history
Do you want to clear your recently browsed history? The app can not retrieve data once it is deleted.
Unable to clear your browsing history.
Do you want to delete all your data including your collections, titles you liked and browsed recently? Once deleted the app can not retrieve the data.
Your collections, favorites, recent history has been deleted.
Flutter provides a functionality to listen to movie ratings using in-built Text to Speech feature.
Flutter supports only US and UK English for Text to Speech as of now. To enable Text to Speech, please download Text to Speech using your device settigns.
Flutter can try to obtain the \'release\' year of the movie to get more accurate ratings.\n\nNote: A lot of TV shows on Netflix do not have correct release year.
Flutter may occasionally send push notifications to ask you to support the app. You may select which notifications you want to receive.

Flutter uses OMDb to get movie ratings, search results, etc. To get accurate ratings for translated titles, we have created our private movie ratings API. It\'s still in beta. If you are facing any problems about getting movie ratings, you may switch back to using OMDb API.

In case there are multiple movies with the same title (and release year is not available), flutter shows you the ratings of the popular title (by votes). A lot of shows on Netflix are new so you can choose to see the ratings based on recency.
Flutter can use My Anime List (MAL) database to get ratings of Animes if it\'s not found on IMDb.
It seems that Text to Speech is not supported by the device.
Flutter lets you export your data in json format. You may share it with your friends, send yourself a copy for back-up or just keep it on your device.
Your data has been successfully exported.\n\nYou may share the file with your friends or send yourself a copy via email.
Please select a flutter data format supported file and the app will import the data.
Manage preferences for apps & rating display duration
Set your privacy preferences and import/export data
Take advantage of Flutter\'s TTS support
Configure settings (include year in searches, etc)
Change color, duration and position of the bubble
Add app to the whitelist for an uninterrupted experience
Customize the look of rating bubble. You may change the position of the bubble by dragging it across the screen. The changes you make here will be reflected when the ratings are displayed.
You can choose to open the movie details in Flutter app or on Imdb website when you click on the rating bubble.
Enable drawing permission to see a more details and interactive rating bubble
Choose between a minimalistic or a detailed version of title ratings.
The bubble will open Imdb search for the title, if the app is unable to find the rating for that title. It will be shown only the first time.
Rating not found.\nTap to search on Imdb.

Flutter can help you decide what you want to watch today! When you are browsing Netflix, Prime Video and other supported apps, it will show you movie ratings on your screen (just like Fb Messenger chat).

Click on 'Activate Flutter' at the bottom to get started with Flutter!

Go to Settings to check out what you can configure.

Flutter is active now. When you are browsing Netflix, Prime Video and other supported apps, it will show you the movie ratings on the screen.\n\nYou may also use Flutter to search for movies and TV shows and create your own collections.
Hey, check out Flutter Ratings! It shows movie ratings on your screen when you\'re browsing Netflix and other streaming apps. Get the app %1s.
Flutter uses Open Movie Database to get movie ratings.
Open Netflix app on your phone and open your favorite movie or a TV show and get ratings instantly.\n\nFlutter also supports other apps such as Prime Video, BBC iPlayer, Hotstar, etc.
Unable to open Netflix app. Flutter also supports other apps if you don\'t use Netflix.
It seems that you have not liked any movies or tv shows in this app
Unable to load your liked titles.\nTry again later.
Unable to add title to %1s collection
Unable to load your browsing history.\nTry again later.
You don\'t have any collections\nCreate new collections and add titles
Do you want to delete the collection: %1s? It can\'t be retrieved once deleted.
Do you want to share all your collections? The app will generate a text file which you can send to your friends and they can import it to the app.
There are no collections to share
This collection is empty\nAdd movies, tv shows to your collection
Unable to load this collection.\nTry again later.
Do you want to remove %1s from this collection?
Unable to add %1s to this collection
Search and add to this collection
Do you want to share this collection? The app will generate a text file which you can send to your friends and they can import it to the app.
There are no titles to be shared in this collection.

It seems that the primary language on your device is not English.

Unfortunately, Flutter does not support translated titles and may sometimes show incorrect ratings.

We are working on adding support for other languages.
Flutter lets you import data from the exported files. Please go over the following options and select what you would like to import.
Unable to import data from this file
This file is not supported by the app.
This file version is not supported by the app.
This file does not contain any data that the app can import.
Notification to prompt users to rate and support the app.
Support the app so that we can provide you future updates and improvements.
Leave a review on Playstore and tell others about your experience with the app.
We don\'t have list of trending titles. Please try again later.
We could not load trending movies and tv shows. Please try again later.

To save battery and optimize the usage, your device stops the apps when they are not used for 30 minutes or so.

This also applies to this app. So when this app is stopped, it will no longer be able to show you movie ratings when you are browsing Netflix or other apps.

This app is developed with battery usage at the center and does not consume a lot of battery.

You can avoid this poor experience by adding this app to battery optimization whitelist in your device settings.
